net.heroicefforts.viable.android
Class NetworkDependentDialog

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      net.heroicefforts.viable.android.NetworkDependentDialog

public class NetworkDependentDialog
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

Monitors network connectivity. If connectivity is lost, then a modal dialog is raised prompting the user to re-establish connectivity or close the application. If connectivity is restored, then the dialog will close. If the user chooses to end the application, then giveUp will be invoked on the parent activity. This class supports delayed network dependent activity creation logic by invoking initOnNetworkAvailability.

Author:
jevans
